name: life of the party (arash tadjiki)
description:
This game was created as part of the 2020 Ludem Dare game jam

“Life of the Party” is a 6DOF (six degrees of freedom) game, in which the player has been invited to a surreal party that’s in shambles. Float your way around the void and get the vibe back!

Credits:

art - andrew taylor johnson @deciduous_drew

programming - arash tadjiki @arashisonline

Controls:

Mouse/Right Stick - Look

WASD/Left Stick - Strafe

Q/E / Triggers - Roll

Left Shift/Space / Bumpers - Descend/Ascend

F / Primary Button - Interact
